name: E3Hub
tag_list: social-network, social-marketplace, free-auctions, professional-network, buy--sell, marketplace, blogging, earn-money, home-business
overview:
Introducing E3Hub; a powerful online community enabling people to network, collaborate and share information with others connected to their hub. E3Hub provides a secure online platform connecting people to their friends, family, community, colleagues and customers. A different kind of social network, members actually get paid for their blogs, profile content and swirls through our advertising revenue share program. The more connections you make the greater earning potential. People use E3Hub to plan events, manage a group, team collaboration or simply market a skill. E3Hub was incorporated November 2011 and has reached over a million users within one year of being online.

E3Hub launched Huswirl.com December 2012; a location based micro blogging site that empowers users to communicate information, promotion, or news to others in the same geographic location. The Hubswirl Android app is available at Google Play Apps. Sending a swirl on your smart phone will GPS tag your message and others with the Hubswirl app will receive the messages if they are within a 3km radius. This is perfect for news or a sharing a promotion happing close to you in real-time.

E3Hub launched Hubpsin.com on January 15th, 2013. Hubspin is a venue for independent musicians to market their band, connect with their fans and earn money by selling their original songs online. Hubspin interfaces with the E3Hub social network to enable new artists to build an online following.

Upcoming additions to the E3Hub network will include the launch of Hubolu Social Marketplace scheduled for February 28th, 2013. March 15th Hiretree.com a professional network for professional services and project outsourcing. March 30th the launch of a global trade network for OEM Manufacturers to showcase their products and provide a sourcing outlet.
